title: FDA Search Drug Adverse Events Input
description: Input schema for searching FDA Adverse Event Reporting System (FAERS) data for drug-related adverse events

drug_name.description: Name of the drug or medication

date_from.description: Start date for date range (YYYYMMDD format)

date_to.description: End date for date range (YYYYMMDD format)

count.description: Field to group results by for counting (e.g., "patient.drug.openfda.brand_name.exact")

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-100)

skip.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
